name: Commemoration for Services to Hansemann company
obverse: Bust of David Hansemann facing forward and slightly right.
obverse_inscriptions: GEB. 12 JULI 1790 DAVID HANSEMANN GEST. 4 AUGUST 1864
reverse_inscriptions: DIRECTION DER DISCONTO GESELLSCHAFT IN BERLIN BEGRÜNDET 1851 *
description: This medal was awarded to Eugen W. Maurer who worked for the company from 1907-1933.
